name: TurboTax Canada 2024 Tax Return
summary: Learn about .TT24 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: When you save a tax return, TurboTax Canada 2024 automatically generates a TT24 file. The file allows you to continue your progress, make edits, and later submit your return electronically or print it for mailing. Common uses for TT24 files include:
Saving a 2024 tax return for filing or future access.
Backing up tax data to prevent loss or corruption.
Transferring 2024 tax information into TurboTax Canada 2025 to prefill next year’s return.
By default, TurboTax Canada 2024 stores TT24 files in the following location:
TurboTax Canada uses a year-based file extension naming convention. For example, a 2023 tax return is saved as TT23, while a 2022 return uses TT22.

instructions: You can open TT24 files with the desktop version of Intuit Canada TurboTax 2024 in Windows. To open a TT24 file with the software, select File → Open Tax Return.

If you are filing your 2025 tax return using TurboTax Canada Online, you can upload a TT24 file to import your 2024 tax data. To do this, go to My Returns → Start a new return, choose your TurboTax product, select TurboTax Download/CD, click Continue, and then upload your TT24 file.
